Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it,

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.

The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and

My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly.

 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before bein

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?'

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly.

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why

My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know yo

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders.

 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders."

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders."

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm so

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the o

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't b disturbed at an

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders."

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something."

The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee sali

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again an

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

Confused, I call my mom up on the phone. I needed to know if she knew about this and why she hid the secret from me.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

Confused, I call my mom up on the phone. I needed to know if she knew about this and why she hid the secret from me.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

She picks up,

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

Confused, I call my mom up on the phone. I needed to know if she knew about this and why she hid the secret from me.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

She picks up, and immeadiately I tell her about the bee and if she kn

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

She picks up, and immediately I tell her about the bee and if she knew about it.

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

Confused, I call my mom up on the phone. I needed to know if she knew about this and why she hid the secret from me.

She picks up, and immediately I tell her about the bee and if she knew about it.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders."

My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

Confused, I call my mom up on the phone. I needed to know if she knew about this and why she hid the secret from me.

She picks up, and immediately I tell her about the bee and if she knew about it. 

"Oh no." She says somberly. "We tried to hid

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders."

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders."

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

Confused, I call my mom up on the phone. I needed to know if she knew about this and why she hid the secret from me.

She picks up, and immediately I tell her about the bee and if she knew about it. 

"Oh no." She says somberly. "We tried to hide this from you...the family secret. I had a lot of explain to you. Your real life is just beginning now." She hangs up the

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

Confused, I call my mom up on the phone. I needed to know if she knew about this and why she hid the secret from me.

She picks up, and immediately I tell her about the bee and if she knew about it. 

"Oh no." She says somberly. "We tried to hide this from you...the family secret. I had a lot of explain to you. Your real life is just beginning now." She hangs up the phone. It is ti

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

At first, I think I am hearing things. But then I hear the buzz on my shoulder again, and a tiny voice asking for orders. I turn and look at the bee, he is staring back at me. I am speechless. My first instinct was to shoo the bee away because I am allergic, but I hesitate, and speak to bee, feeling silly. 

I ask the bee what he is doing here and what he means by 'your majesty'.
The bee responds, "I am a bee, your majesty.
 Our queen has told the hive much about you. We have been trying to reach you for the past several years but someone keeps shooing us away and preventing us from reaching you. I am overjoyed to be here with you now your majesty. I am here to serve you."

"But you're just a bee." I say. "How can you help me?"

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"We bees may be small, but we are powerful when we work together. Why don't you give it a shot? Ask me for something."

I think for a bit and then I decide to test it out. I ask the bee to get me a beer.

"At once." the bee responds and then zips away. I see him come back with a small swarm of bees that approach the fridge. They form a hand and pull open fridge, pick up a can of beer, open it, and bring it back to me. I hear all of the voices at once say in unison "Here you are your majesty."

I am stunned. I drink the beer and thank the bees. They salute me all at once and the swarm flies away, leaving that one bee from before behind who lands on my shoulder.

"Do you believe me now?"

"Yes I do, but why me?"

"I don't know your majesty, I just follow my orders." 

"Can you take me to see the queen? I have some questions."

The bee shakes his little head "I'm sorry but that is the one thing I cannot do. The queen mustn't be disturbed at any time." The bee flies to my other shoulder. "what do you want me to do now?" He asks.

"Nothing for now. But i can let you know when I think of something." The bee salutes me again and flies into my shirt pocket and tells me he is with me if I need him.

Confused, I call my mom up on the phone. I needed to know if she knew about this and why she hid the secret from me.

She picks up, and immediately I tell her about the bee and if she knew about it. 

"Oh no." She says somberly. "We tried to hide this from you...the family secret. I had a lot of explain to you. Your real life is just beginning now." She hangs up the phone. It is time for me to realize my desti
